main event: A resident of Priest Lake, Idaho reported sighting a strange object in the sky on Sept 1, 1962.
interesting points: The object was a large, partially illuminated, disc-shaped craft that hovered motionless for a time, then suddenly accelerated and departed at a high rate of speed.
The witness was able to observe the object for several minutes and estimated it to be approximately 75-100 feet in diameter.
The object was partially illuminated, with a bright light at the center and darker edges.
The witness felt a strange sensation during the observation and claimed that all electrical equipment in his home malfunctioned briefly during the event.
The Air Force conducted an investigation but was unable to definitively identify the object, and the incident remains classified as an 'unidentified' sighting in the Project Blue Book files.
sighted object: a large, partially illuminated, disc-shaped craft
witnesses: a resident of Priest Lake, Idaho
